mapper.select: SELECT a.`from`,a.`to` FROM (SELECT DISTINCT `from`,`to` FROM line_info WHERE `from` = #{name} or `to` = #{name})as a WHERE `from` in (SELECT st_name FROM st_location WHERE area = '华中') AND a.`to` in (SELECT st_name FROM st_location WHERE area = '华中')
SELECT lng,lat FROM st_location WHERE st_name = #{name}
SELECT lng,lat,st_name FROM st_location WHERE st_name in (SELECT `name` FROM margin WHERE area =#{area})
SELECT `group` FROM wind_group WHERE time = #{time} AND member LIKE #{member}
